description: Checks for accounting issues like improper interest capitalization, nonaccrual status, and handling of restructured or discounted loans, based on Comptroller's Handbook.

parameters.name: guideline_nonaccrual_summary
parameters.description: Summary of conditions for nonaccrual status and return to accrual.
parameters.defaultValue: Nonaccrual if payment not expected or 90+ days past due unless well-secured & collecting.

parameters.name: guideline_interest_capitalization
parameters.defaultValue: Inappropriate for most classified loans. Reverse or charge off if improperly capitalized.

parameters.name: guideline_restructured_loans
parameters.description: Guideline on handling formally restructured loans.
parameters.defaultValue: Monitor closely. Sustained performance (e.g., 6 months) under modified terms needed before upgrade.

parameters.name: guideline_loans_purchased_at_discount
parameters.description: Guideline on accounting for loans purchased at a discount.
parameters.defaultValue: Book at purchase price. Discount recognized as yield adjustment or per AICPA Bulletin 6 if full payment not expected.

parameters.name: loan_current_status_str
parameters.description: Current status of the loan (e.g., performing, nonaccrual, days past due).

parameters.name: interest_capitalized_flag_bool
parameters.description: Boolean indicating if interest is currently being capitalized or has been recently.

parameters.name: loan_classification_str
parameters.description: Current internal or regulatory classification of the loan (e.g., Pass, Substandard, Doubtful, Loss).

parameters.name: is_formally_restructured_bool
parameters.description: Boolean indicating if the loan has been formally restructured.

parameters.name: restructured_terms_summary_str
parameters.description: Summary of modified terms if restructured, and performance history since restructure.

parameters.name: is_purchased_at_discount_bool
parameters.description: Boolean indicating if the loan was purchased at a discount.

parameters.name: purchase_discount_details_str
parameters.description: Details about the discount and reason if purchased at discount.
